item.title: How we learn?
item.description:
I started this post saying that I’ve always been interested in learn but I’ve never thought about how we learn, I mean the process of learn itself. As my research is focused on mixed reality in education and immersive learning I think this is something I should need to know so here we go…

What is learning? Learning is commonly defined as a process that brings together cognitive, emotional, and environmental influences and experiences for acquiring, enhancing, or making changes in one’s knowledge, skills, values, and world views (Illeris, 2004; Ormrod, 1995).
